description.value:
Your tongue can momentarily latch on as readily as your hands. So long as you can freely open your mouth, you do not need free hands in order to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Disarm]{Disarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Grab an Edge]{Grab an Edge}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip}.

If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Long Tongue]{Long Tongue} feat, you can Disarm, Grab an Edge, and Trip with your tongue at a distance that is 5 feet beyond your normal reach.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
